attributes.action: Scrap plans for a national identity register and compulsary ID cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government has proved time and time again that it is not capable of looking after sensitive data.

This potential scheme puts all our data in one place, controlled by a Government (and/or private contractors) who have proven that they are not competent to be trusted with it.

To force and charge people into such a scheme takes away the liberties we have long fought to establish.

The justification that it will help reduce terrorism is insignificant when compared to the consequences of losing the private information of over 60 million individuals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
